title: EntityCacheCommands
contents:
mode_edit code
API > @ngrx/data

EntityCacheCommandslink

A collection's cache-only commands, which do not update remote storage **

interface EntityCacheCommands<T> { addAllToCache(entities: T[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void addOneToCache(entity: T, options?: EntityActionOptions): void addManyToCache(entities: T[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void clearCache(options?: EntityActionOptions): void removeOneFromCache(entity: T, options?: EntityActionOptions): void removeManyFromCache(entities: T[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void updateOneInCache(entity: Partial<T>, options?: EntityActionOptions): void updateManyInCache(entities: Partial<T>[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void upsertOneInCache(entity: Partial<T>, options?: EntityActionOptions): void upsertManyInCache(entities: Partial<T>[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void setFilter(pattern: any, options?: EntityActionOptions): void setLoaded(isLoaded: boolean, options?: EntityActionOptions): void setLoading(isLoading: boolean, options?: EntityActionOptions): void }

Child interfaceslink

  • EntityCommands
    • EntityDispatcher
    • EntityCollectionService

Methodslink

addAllToCache() link

mode_edit code

Replace all entities in the cached collection. Does not save to remote storage.
addAllToCache(entities: T[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

entities T[]

to add directly to cache.
options EntityActionOptions

options such as mergeStrategy

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

addOneToCache() link

mode_edit code

Add a new entity directly to the cache. Does not save to remote storage. Ignored if an entity with the same primary key is already in cache.
addOneToCache(entity: T, options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

entity T

to add directly to cache.
options EntityActionOptions

options such as mergeStrategy

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

addManyToCache() link

mode_edit code

Add multiple new entities directly to the cache. Does not save to remote storage. Entities with primary keys already in cache are ignored.
addManyToCache(entities: T[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

entities T[]

to add directly to cache.
options EntityActionOptions

options such as mergeStrategy

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

clearCache() link

mode_edit code

Clear the cached entity collection
clearCache(options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

options EntityActionOptions

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

removeOneFromCache() link

mode_edit code

Remove an entity directly from the cache. Does not delete that entity from remote storage.
removeOneFromCache(key: string | number, options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

key string | number

The primary key of the entity to remove
options EntityActionOptions

options such as mergeStrategy

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

removeManyFromCache() link

mode_edit code

Remove multiple entities directly from the cache. Does not delete these entities from remote storage.
removeManyFromCache(keys: (string | number)[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

keys (string | number)[]

The primary keys of the entities to remove
options EntityActionOptions

options such as mergeStrategy

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

updateOneInCache() link

mode_edit code

Update a cached entity directly. Does not update that entity in remote storage. Ignored if an entity with matching primary key is not in cache. The update entity may be partial (but must have its key) in which case it patches the existing entity.
updateOneInCache(entity: Partial<T>, options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

entity Partial<T>

to update directly in cache.
options EntityActionOptions

options such as mergeStrategy

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

updateManyInCache() link

mode_edit code

Update multiple cached entities directly. Does not update these entities in remote storage. Entities whose primary keys are not in cache are ignored. Update entities may be partial but must at least have their keys. such partial entities patch their cached counterparts.
updateManyInCache(entities: Partial<T>[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

entities Partial<T>[]

to update directly in cache.
options EntityActionOptions

options such as mergeStrategy

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

upsertOneInCache() link

mode_edit code

Insert or update a cached entity directly. Does not save to remote storage. Upsert entity might be a partial of T but must at least have its key. Pass the Update structure as the payload.
upsertOneInCache(entity: Partial<T>, options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

entity Partial<T>

to upsert directly in cache.
options EntityActionOptions

options such as mergeStrategy

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

upsertManyInCache() link

mode_edit code

Insert or update multiple cached entities directly. Does not save to remote storage. Upsert entities might be partial but must at least have their keys. Pass an array of the Update structure as the payload.
upsertManyInCache(entities: Partial<T>[], options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

entities Partial<T>[]

to upsert directly in cache.
options EntityActionOptions

options such as mergeStrategy

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

setFilter() link

mode_edit code

Set the pattern that the collection's filter applies when using the filteredEntities selector.
setFilter(pattern: any, options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

pattern any
options EntityActionOptions

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

setLoaded() link

mode_edit code

Set the loaded flag
setLoaded(isLoaded: boolean, options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

isLoaded boolean
options EntityActionOptions

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void

setLoading() link

mode_edit code

Set the loading flag
setLoading(isLoading: boolean, options?: EntityActionOptions): void

Parameters

isLoading boolean
options EntityActionOptions

Optional. Default is undefined.

Returns

void
